name: The Power Factory
description: The Power Factory is a game where you build a power factory and later in the game multiple power factories. Be smart when designing you map or things will go wrong rather quickly, so think before acting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista Processor: Dual Core 3Ghz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 500 MB available space
